topic: How to document REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: In this guide, we'll walk through the process of documenting REST APIs using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Supports multiple routes and methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)
Includes features like type validation and input/output schema
Offers a user-friendly interface for testing APIs during development
version_notes: Newer versions may have additional features and improvements
caveats: Ensure your FastAPI installation is up-to-date using pip install --upgrade fastapi
FastAPI requires Python >=3.7, but for best performance, use Python 3.12 or later.
